manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Stronger Magnetic Lock Hold Tight Powerful built-in magnets with a holding force of 1,500 g enable a stronger magnetic lock on MagSafe-style chargers and accessories than your caseless phone or even official MagSafe cases.

MagSafe Accessories Mix and Match MagSafe The built-in magnetic ring in the case lets you snap on chargers, wireless power banks, wallets, stands, and more. Streamline your everyday carry items into a powerfully convenient, all-in-one system.

Military-Grade Protection Fortify Your Phone Reinforced with shock-absorbing corners to provide test-certified tough protection against every kind of drop and bump. Get the phone security you need, day in, day out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek Protection for Your iPhone 15 Plus - A Clear Winner!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the ESR iPhone 15 Plus Clear Case (image above), and I couldn't be more thrilled with my decision. This case offers the perfect blend of style, durability, and functionality, making it a must-have accessory for any iPhone 15 Plus owner.First and foremost, the quality of this case is outstanding. The clear design allows the sleek beauty of the iPhone 15 Plus to shine through, while also providing excellent protection against scratches, scuffs, and minor drops. The material feels sturdy and well-made, giving me confidence that my device is safe and secure at all times.One of the things I love most about this case is its minimalist design. It adds virtually no bulk to the phone, maintaining the slim profile that I love about the iPhone 15 Plus. Plus, the clear finish and MagSafe ring gives it a modern and sophisticated look that complements the device perfectly.In terms of functionality, this case delivers on all fronts. The precise cutouts for the camera, ports, and buttons ensure easy access to all the features of the iPhone 15 Plus without any hindrance. The raised edges around the screen and camera also provide added protection against scratches and damage when placed on flat surfaces. And even the MagSafe ring that allows you to magnetically and wirelessly charge your phone on the go!Overall, I couldn't be happier with my purchase of the iPhone 15 Plus Clear Case. It offers high-quality protection without sacrificing style, making it well worth the investment. If you're in the market for a clear case for your iPhone 15 Plus, look no further - this one is a clear winner!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ESR - the Gold Standard for iPhone accessories
reviews.reviewText: I've been using ESR products since the iPhone6 and have never been disappointed. The company continues to be consistent with quality, durability and performance. Add to that their great customer-service and you pretty much have a no-brainer when it comes to protecting and showcasing your iPhone 15 ProMax.Pros:1) hard as nails2) buttons are perfect with a crisp touch3) magnet is probably the best one for Magsafe accessories including charging disks and car mounts4) grip is smooth without being slippery5) bottom ports are cut out precisely6) excellent camera guardCons: noneTo top it all off, this case is extremely handsome, which may or may not be important to you. Great case at a fair price-point.Thanks for your time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product and value
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this case for my wife's new Apple 15 Pro. Perfect fit, offers good protection and looks nice. Additionally, it's designed to work with a wireless charger (which we will be getting in the near future).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Protection and MagSafe Popsocket holding case
reviews.reviewText: I did a lot of research for a phone case for my new iPhone and this is the one I went with. It was the right color combination that I wanted and it looks great on my phone. I also read the reviews and watched the videos on if it was compatible with the popsocket grips and it looked very promising. It arrived quickly and was nicely packaged. I snapped it onto my phone and it was easy installation. I also like the fact that if I need to take off the case, it comes off easily than other ones that I have had over the years. It adds great protection for what I need and I've dropped it a few times and so far no scratches or dents on the case. I like that it has raised bumpers on the corners and it also has a phone accessory holes on the lower left hand side. I can't remember the last time I've had that on a phone case! I am also happy that the magnetic grip is very strong as they state to the point that I have to pry off my popsocket to remove it. Guaranteed to hold and not just fall off. Overall, I love it. It's durable and does the job. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good protection but bulkier than I’d like
reviews.reviewText: Bought the case as added protection when I’m out and about. Otherwise, my iPhone15 Pro is caseless. HaloLock is great as I’ve learned from other ESR Products. I would add that the case is not sealed so dust will get under the case every now and then. Being a protective case, it does add a very noticeable weight to my otherwise light phone. There appears to be a slot on the side for a lanyard as well. Camera lens and screen protection is adequate to lay on any flat surface. Since I don’t always have the case on, it does help does it’s not too rigid that it’s easy to put on and off my phone. Great case overall, just not as minimalist as I’d like but then again, I chose a case to have MagSafe compatibility so it somewhat limited my options.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my wife's iPhone 14. Fits well but not so tight that you can't remove it when needed. The magnet seems to be stronger than average and holds the detachable wallet. that I also purchased. These 2 Items replaced her old case with a built-in wallet that worked great but did not allow for wireless charging. Well made but it does seem heavier than most.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid for a basic case
reviews.reviewText: If you're looking for something low profile, that will protect your phone from basic, where in tear, moving around and occasional short drops, this is a great case. I also like it because it lets me keep the color of my phone and the cutout fit perfectly on my iPhone 15 pro.It will not do is protect it from water damage and definitely allows dirt inside of it so you will have to make sure to clean it regularly so that dust and dirt did not accumulate.Overall a very good case for the basic user.

reviews.reviewTitle: A melhor marca de capinha que já usei tirando a Apple.
reviews.reviewText: Fiquei bem impressionado quando recebi e testei o produto, qualidade faz jus ao preço.A capa não é tao fina e nem tão grossa, pode se dizer que ela está entre o meio termo, mas de qualquer forma, ela tem um design muito inteligente e muito bem feito. Durabilidade dela está sendo, até o momento, perfeito e aparenta ser muito durável, realmente uma compra que valeu a pena.Sobre o preço, vi algumas avaliações reclamando do valor ou dizendo que não vale 150 reais, coisas desse tipo pra mim não faz muito sentido, pois você está com um celular de, no mínimo, 10 mil reais no bolso! Acessórios desse valor e dessa qualidade valem o investimento, pois você está cuidando do seu celular e quer fazer o dinheiro gasto nele valer a pena.

Nice case which fits well and has yet to discolour. Has protected phone already from numerous drops and does not obscure phone camera. I wanted to see the green case underneath. Good value and durable

reviews.reviewTitle: A Blend of Style and Protection
reviews.reviewText: The ESR case has proven to be a delightful addition to my smartphone accessories, providing a seamless balance between aesthetic appeal and robust protection.Design:The sleek and slim design of the ESR case instantly caught my eye. The precision in crafting this case reflects attention to detail, maintaining the device's slim profile while offering comprehensive coverage. The matte finish not only enhances the grip but also resists fingerprints, keeping the case looking clean and stylish.Durability:One of the standout features is the durability of the ESR case. The sturdy construction provides reliable protection against daily wear and tear, ensuring my device stays safeguarded from accidental drops and impacts. The reinforced corners and raised edges around the screen and camera add an extra layer of defense.Functionality:The case's precise cutouts align perfectly with all ports, buttons, and features, allowing seamless access to all functionalities without hindrance. The tactile feedback from the buttons remains responsive, contributing to a smooth user experience. The strong megsafe charging compatibility is a convenient addition, eliminating the need to remove the case for charging.Versatility:ESR has succeeded in creating a versatile case that complements various lifestyles. Whether you're a busy professional or an on-the-go individual, the ESR case effortlessly adapts to different environments, providing reliable protection without compromising style.Value for Money:Considering the build quality, design aesthetics, and protective features, the ESR case offers excellent value for money. It strikes the right balance between affordability and premium quality, making it a wise investment for anyone seeking a reliable smartphone case.In conclusion, the ESR case has exceeded my expectations in terms of design, durability, functionality, versatility, and overall value for money. It not only enhances the aesthetics of my device but also provides the peace of mind that comes with knowing my smartphone is well-protected. I highly recommend the ESR case to anyone in search of a reliable and stylish accessory for their smartphone.

reviews.reviewTitle: Clear, Magnetic, and Fantastic: A Review of the ESR iPhone 15 Pro Case
reviews.reviewText: I bought this case for my iPhone 15 Pro and I am very happy with it. The case is compatible with MagSafe, which means I can easily attach and detach accessories like chargers, wallets, and stands. The magnets are strong and secure, and they do not interfere with the wireless charging or the signal.The case also offers military-grade protection, which means it can withstand drops and shocks without damaging the phone. The edges are slightly raised to protect the screen and the camera. The case is yellowing resistant and scratch-resistant, which means it will stay clear and clean for a long time. I hope it does not yellow over time, as some other clear cases do.The best part of this case is that it showcases the natural colour of the iPhone. I love the design and the colour of my iPhone 15 Pro, and I do not want to hide it behind a bulky or colourful case. This case is clear and transparent, and it lets the beauty of the iPhone shine through. It also fits perfectly and feels comfortable in the hand.Overall, I highly recommend this case to anyone who is looking for a clear, magnetic, and protective case for their iPhone 15 Pro. It is worth every penny and it makes the iPhone even more enjoyable to use.

The first thing to note is that this case fits like a glove. I mean, a perfect fit. As far as cases go, this one is sturdy. The sides have a soft feel to them but, it's got a thick and hard bumper that protects your phone. The clear plastic hasn't changed color (it hasn't been too long) but usually you can tell when something is going to get dirty or stain pretty early on. The Mag Safe magnet works perfectly. I have a Mag Safe Pop Socket on it and it snaps on easily. I've taken the Pop Socket off and on and the magnet on the case is going strong. I love how it has buttons molded over the existing phone ones and they never fail to do what they gotta do when you click them. This case doesn't have a cover over the camera lenses but, I chose that specifically. I take a lot of pictures and I don't want anything in between the lens. The nice thing about the case, though, is that the cameras are bordered by a sturdy and thick-ish frame that kind of raises it so your lenses won't be scratched when you put your phone down. Overall, it's a great case, I think it's priced fairly for the quality. ESR really made a beautiful case.
